short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Extension fetches hilarious jokes from a dedicated API and delivers them straight to you with just a click on extension's popup!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: JokeFetcher is your daily dose of laughter, right in your browser! This Chrome extension fetches hilarious jokes from a dedicated API and delivers them straight to you with just a click. Whether you need a quick break, a pick-me-up during a dull day, or a way to impress your friends with witty humor, Joke Fetcher has got you covered.
